resources.string: You\'ve taken the first step to transform your photos and video into digital proof.
ProofMode taps into all of the sensors on your device it can. Make sure to enable permissions as they are requested.
ProofMode is always running in the background, automatically adding proof to all photos and videos you take.
When you need to share something with proof, just open the photo or video, and select SHARE PROOF from the Share menu.
